resources.string: Movie data generously provided by The Movie DB
Material Design Icons provided free of charge under Apache License version 2.0 https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

This app displays a list of the most popular movies as determined by The Movie DB (TMDB). The movies are sorted by popularity from most to least popular. Volley is used to request and retrieve the data from TMDB web api. GSON is used to parse the movie data. Glide is used for image management.
